7.m: She will bear a son, and you shall call his name Jesus, for he will save his people from their sins. - Matthew 1:21 (ESV)

l.q: What kind of man was Joseph?
l.a: Joseph was a just man, and he was unwilling to put Mary to shame. He was also obedient to God, he took Mary for his wife when he learned that the child in her womb is from the Holy Spirit.

l.q: What does the name Immanuel mean?
l.a: Immanuel means God is with us.

l.q: Why should Joseph name his son 'Jesus'?
l.a: Joseph should name his son 'Jesus' because Jesus will save his people from their sins.
